p2

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • p2.Sound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class for playing a sound clip.

      • getSound

        public static Sound getSound(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns a Sound object specified by the filename argument
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Sound object if possible, otherwise null

      • getSound

        public static Sound getSound(byte[] byteSound)

      • play

        public void play()
        Begins to play the sound / resumes play back of a sound that is paused. A sound can only be started once.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops play back of the sound.
